txt.en: You have defeated many of the wicked Dourhands occupying Caivád Sâr.
After mysteriously arriving in Elderslade during the War of Three Peaks, a force of Dourhands has occupied the Angmarim settlement of Caivád Sâr.
Dourhands can be found at Caivád Sâr and within Tûr Ágal.\n\nYou have discovered a force of wicked Dourhands occupying Caivád Sâr. You should defeat them.

While the War of Three Peaks rages throughout Elderslade, you have discovered a large force of Dourhands occupying Caivád Sâr.

Far fewer Angmarim loyal to the Iron Crown appear to dwell within the settlement, and the route by which the Dourhands arrived in Elderslade remains unclear. However, it seems the Dourhands' wickedness has not abated since your earlier encounters with them.

You should defeat many of the wicked Dourhands occupying Caivád Sâr.

You have defeated many of the wicked Dourhands occupying Caivád Sâr.\n\nIt remains unclear where the Dourhands came from, but they seem to be many in number. It appears much has transpired since they sought to form an alliance with Angmar in the early days of the War of the Ring.
